decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1. The proposed boundary details fail to demonstrate adequately the location and appearance of the proposed boundary treatment, consequently the overall appearance of and impact of the boundary treatment cannot be fully assessed.
description: Following approval for additions and alterations to the approved scheme (planning reference 00443/G/P4) for 'demolition of existing buildings and erection of 191 flats, 93 bed hotel (including ancillary restaurant), retail and restaurant units, Thameside path, vehicular access from Goat Wharf, change of use of Peerless Pump building to a restaurant and managers flat, underground car parking and landscaping' by the addition of 42 flats and an additional 53 bedrooms to the hotel, an additional access from Town Meadow and widening of the inter-tidal inlet. Details submitted pursuant to Condition 20 (Boundary treatment)
